com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.query
Class QueryConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.query.QueryConverter

public class QueryConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Used internally for queries/selects to convert OA object queries into SQL.
Uses JOINs or LEFT OUTER JOINS to connect super/sub classes and ONE type references.
Uses EXISTS for MANY type references.
Will work with any valid object path.
Allows OR, ||, AND, &&, (), =, !=, NULL, <, <=, >, >=

Converts to SQL using OAQueryTokenizer to parse object query into tokens, along with Database to Object Mapping.

See Also:
to see if the query will require the use of the "DISTINCT" keyword.

Method Detail

getUseDistinct

public boolean getUseDistinct()
returns true if this query will only be able to select the Pk columns and the "Distinct" keyword should be used by the query to make sure that duplicates are not selected.
